name: Screen to World

inputs.name: Z Depth
inputs.description: The Z position in world units from the camera

inputs.name: Camera
inputs.description: The camera that provides the input viewport space

description: Transform a position from camera viewport space to world space. The input viewport space is normalized to the camera. The bottom left of the camera viewport is (0,0) and the top right is (1,1). The Z position is in world units from the camera.
